com.icfolson.aem.library.api

Interface Linkable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BasicNode, ComponentNode, PageDecorator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractComponent, DelegateComponentNode

    public interface Linkable
    Definition for "linkable" items, such as pages and components (i.e. path-addressable resources).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getHref()
      Get the URL for this item.
      String getHref(boolean mapped)
      Get the mapped URL for this item.
      Link getLink()
      Get a link for this item.
      Link getLink(boolean mapped)
      Get a link for this item.
      LinkBuilder getLinkBuilder()
      Get a link builder for the current resource path.
      LinkBuilder getLinkBuilder(boolean mapped)
      Get a mapped link builder for the current resource path.

    • Method Detail

      • getHref

        String getHref()
        Get the URL for this item.
        Returns:
        href

      • getHref

        String getHref(boolean mapped)
        Get the mapped URL for this item.
        Parameters:
        mapped - if true, the path will be routed through the resource resolver to determine the mapped path (e.g. without leading "/content").
        Returns:
        mapped href

      • getLink

        Link getLink()
        Get a link for this item.
        Returns:
        link

      • getLink

        Link getLink(boolean mapped)
        Get a link for this item.
        Parameters:
        mapped - if true, the Link path will be routed through the resource resolver to determine the mapped path (e.g. without leading "/content").
        Returns:
        mapped link

      • getLinkBuilder

        LinkBuilder getLinkBuilder()
        Get a link builder for the current resource path.
        Returns:
        builder instance for this item

      • getLinkBuilder

        LinkBuilder getLinkBuilder(boolean mapped)
        Get a mapped link builder for the current resource path.
        Parameters:
        mapped - if true, the LinkBuilder for this resource will be routed through the resource resolver to determine the mapped path (e.g. without leading "/content").
        Returns:
        builder instance for this item containing the mapped link
